actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide for greater flexibility in implementing national ambient air quality standards.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, upon application of a Governor of a State, to extend the time period for implementation of the national ambient air quality standards under the Clean Air Act. Sets forth the standards under which such extension may be granted.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide for greater flexibility in implementing national ambient air quality standards.
